headline: Down 93%, Is It Finally Time to Buy Moderna?
summary: As we near the five-year anniversary of the COVID-19 pandemic, it's a good time to revisit the drugmaker stock that was top of mind back then.  A few years ago, Moderna (NASDAQ: MRNA) stock soared on the back of the highly successful vaccine it developed in record time.  At its peak in 2021, Moderna traded for over $450 per share.
